name: 54 75 72 6e 2e 20 41 72 6f 75 6e 64 2e
description:
So, firstly, this is one week late (exactly). I was supposed to submit this easter day, which i didn't, but i am now. i will continue to update this, so stay in touch with it. Also i don't thing the WebGL is working, i'll fix that tommorrow.

Here's what i did:

Added levels,

Added "bouncy" script to make objects bounce the player on contact

Added cave background (Level 2 is just a walk in the park):                                                    cave background art: https://lil-cthulhu.itch.io/pixel-art-cave-background

Added hyper-foreground (Grid in-front of the player model, complete with see-through vents.)

Added some other stuff but its 10:30 at night, so i'll update this later.

If this is buggy, just add a comment and i will address it.

(besides the lag-va)

Added music:

Song: Warptech - Last Summer [NCS Release]

Music provided by NoCopyrightSounds

Free Download/Stream: http://ncs.io/lastsummer
